message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.CR 

This paper deals with person search, which is a computer vision task. The paper proposes a novel approach that uses segmentation masks to guide the network and learn discriminative features for pedestrian detection and person re-identification. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Additionally, the paper involves deep learning techniques and optimization, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also uses benchmark datasets for evaluation, which could place it in cs.MM (Multimedia) or cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
